name: EVIL STAR
description: EVIL STAR is a horizontal scroll strategy leisure arcade game, you just need to use the left and right button to control the spaceship! You need to operate your spaceship to avoid asteroids, collect energy balls. Steam clouds and leaderboards supported, compete with your friends now!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Prosessor: 1.6 GHz Grafikk: intel Graphics DirectX: Versjon 9.0 Lagring: 300 MB tilgjengelig plass Lydkort: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
recommended_requirements: Anbefalt: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Prosessor: 1.6 GHz OR MORE Grafikk: NIVIDIA OR AMD DirectX: Versjon 9.0 Lagring: 900 MB tilgjengelig plass Lydkort: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
